      • addScript

        public static void addScript(AppContext conn,
             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
             java.lang.String script)
        Add a script to be included by the head tag. must be called before the head tag. parameters are expanded. If the value starts with a / it is a url. If it starts with // it is a remote url. This method is to include scripts from a java fragment.
        Parameters:
        conn -
        request -
        script -

      • markAsFormPage

        public static void markAsFormPage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        mark a page as continaing a form. This must be done before the header is generated
        Parameters:
        request -
        See Also:
